name: KDE-EDBN
full_name: Kernel Density Estimation Extended Dynamic Bayesian Networks
paper: Detecting Anomalies in Hybrid Business Process Logs.
description: EDBN extends the formalism of Dynamic Bayesian Networks (DBNs) to incorporate the aspects that are typical for log files. DBNs are an extension of Bayesian Networks that are able to incorporate discrete time. DBNs link events to their predecessors in order to find relations between these events rather than only relations within one event. KDE-EDBN further extends EDBN for numerical attributes using Kernel Density Estimation.
